faq.title: We Answer Your Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our automation solutions.
faq.q1: What is VoiceAI and how does it work?
faq.a1: VoiceAI is our intelligent voice assistant that uses natural language processing to interact with your customers in a conversational and natural way. It can understand complex queries and provide contextually relevant responses, significantly improving the customer experience.
faq.a2: We use the official WhatsApp Business API to automate messages, send properties, and manage conversations intelligently and personalized. The integration is seamless with your existing systems and allows complete control over automated conversations.
faq.a3: We offer personalized plans based on your specific needs. Our prices vary depending on the volume of conversations, features required, and level of customization. Contact us for a free consultation and quotes tailored to your business.
faq.a4: Implementation varies depending on project complexity. VoiceAI can be ready in 1-2 weeks, while custom solutions may take 4-8 weeks. We work with you to establish a realistic timeline and keep you informed throughout the process.
faq.a5: Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption and comply with all GDPR and European data protection regulations. Your information is stored on secure servers and we never share data with third parties without your explicit consent.
faq.q6: What type of support do you offer?
faq.a6: We offer 24/7 support, complete documentation, personalized training, and a dedicated account manager to ensure your success. Our expert team is available to resolve any questions and continuously optimize your automations.
faq.q7: Can it be customized for my business?
faq.a7: Yes, all our solutions are highly customizable. We develop automations specifically designed for your industry, work processes, and business objectives. Each implementation perfectly adapts to your unique needs.
faq.q8: Does it work with my current systems?
faq.a8: Our solutions integrate with most common business systems like CRM, ERP, and management tools. We perform a technical assessment beforehand to ensure seamless integration with your existing infrastructure.
